findings.professionalBio: Brad Pitzele is the founder of One Thousand Roads and creator of the LEO System, an at-home Exercise With Oxygen Therapy (EWOT) device. After a personal struggle with autoimmune illness he developed a low-cost EWOT solution and launched One Thousand Roads to make EWOT accessible to people with chronic conditions. He has appeared on podcasts such as Dave Asprey's The Human Upgrade to discuss EWOT, mitochondrial health, and the LEO System.
credentials: Founder, One Thousand Roads (stated on company About page)
Creator/developer of the LEO System (company product pages and marketing)
Podcast guest on The Human Upgrade (Dave Asprey) discussing EWOT

sources.title: 15-Minute Oxygen Hack for Energy & Longevity - Dave Asprey (EP 1301)
